name: Behold the Face of Justice!
flavor: You attack a foe and your enemies behold a vision of the true nature of your resolve.

metadata.flavor: You attack a foe and your enemies behold a vision of the true nature of your resolve.
metadata.item_name: Behold the Face of Justice! (5 Wrath)

effects.tier1: 3 + M holy damage; if the target has P < WEAK, each enemy within 2 squares of them is frightened of you (save ends)
effects.tier2: 5 + M holy damage; if the target has P < AVERAGE, each enemy within 2 squares of them is frightened of you (save ends)
effects.tier3: 8 + M holy damage; if the target has P < STRONG, each enemy within 2 squares of them is frightened of you (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each enemy frightened this way is pushed up to 2 squares away from the target and takes psychic damage equal to your Presence score.
